actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Resolution that the House of Representatives disapproves the plan submitted by the Secretary of the Interior, pursuant to the provisions of the act of October 19, 1973 (87 Stat. 466), providing for the distribution of funds appropriated in satisfaction of an award of the Indian Claims Commission to the Cowlitz Tribe of Indians in docket No. 218.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives disapproves the plan submitted by the Secretary of the Interior providing for the distribution of funds appropriated in satisfaction of an award of the Indian Claims Commission to the Cowlitz Tribe of Indians of Washington.

titles.title: Resolution that the House of Representatives disapproves the plan submitted by the Secretary of the Interior, pursuant to the provisions of the act of October 19, 1973 (87 Stat. 466), providing for the distribution of funds appropriated in satisfaction of an award of the Indian Claims Commission to the Cowlitz Tribe of Indians in docket No. 218.
